MagneticReadoutProcessing
  • Module - MagneticReadoutProcessing
  • MRP
  • View page source

MRPÔÉÅ

Modules

MRP.MRPAnalysis

collection of reading processing functions such as fft, mean, center of gravity

MRP.MRPBaseSensor

base class to query (b-value and temp) values from a hardware sensor running the UnifiedSensorFirmware

MRP.MRPConfig

MRP.MRPDataVisualization

collection of reading data plotting functions

MRP.MRPHal

class for interfacing (hardware, protocol) sensors running the UnifiedSensorFirmware

MRP.MRPHallbachArrayGenerator

generates magnet structures out of given readings and export hallbach rings

MRP.MRPHelpers

Provides some misc functions like translate and other helper functions

MRP.MRPMagnetTypes

collection of magnet specifications for different magnet types such as cubic n45,.

MRP.MRPMeasurementConfig

stores basic metadata about a reading

MRP.MRPOpenSCADGenerator

generates openscad structures

MRP.MRPPolarVisualization

plotting function to render polar plots of a reading

MRP.MRPReading

stores all reading relevant information values, datapoints, meta-data

MRP.MRPReadingEntry

one datapoint for a reading

MRP.MRPReadoutSource

The MRPReadoutSource class is a BaseSource for the Python magpylib (https://magpylib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

MRP.MRPSimulation

collection of functions to generate magnet data in software
